Name:
* Misha Aloian RUS disqualified from the competition for doping in accordance with Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS)' announcement of December 8, 2016. 




Men's Flyweight - Boxing - Rio 2016 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     The competition was a single elimination tournament without seeding where the winner of each match   advanced to the next round. Winners of the semifinals qualified for the Gold Medal match. Both losers were awarded Bronze Medals. Event facts: Men's Flyweight competition was held at the Riocentro - pavilion 6 and 26 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Men's Flyweight - Rio 2016 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
